entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.2°C

Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
